name: Jammerball (itch)
description:
Jammerball is a sports game based on dodgeball and inspired by the classic arcade game Windjammers.

The main difference with classic dodgeball is that each player has a stamina bar that goes down with every hit taken. Everytime the whole bar of any player is consumed, the rival team scores one point.

There is also an energy bar, which allows players to sprint (in order to dodge hits or reach for contested balls), or to make special shots (which do much more damage than normal ones). This bar recharges over time.

There are 3 difficult levels.

Play alone or with friends on a several multiplayer modes. Cooperative, 1vs1 or 2vs2

There are 8 teams in Jammerball, and all of them have their own unique arena. Each team has a specific weakness in some aspect of the game, with only two exceptions: one with no weaknesses, and one with all of them.

Drunken Brothers (all weaknesses) – Drunken Dome
Broken Wings (weak speed) – Wingless Garden
The Scratchers (weak shooting potency) – Little Claw Palace
Tired Spirits (weak energy recharging speed) – Yawning Center
Exhausteds (weak total energy) – Weakness Palace
Rubber Souls (weak resistance) – Bouncing Colliseum
Soapy Hands (weak catching ability) – Slippery Ground
Mighty Highers (no weaknesses) – The Very Best Garden
